price: Aane, Dͻnhwere no ne εberε a yεde ahyε wͻn bͻ; na Dͻnhwere no ano yε den na (εyε berε nso) a emu (nsɛm) yε nyono.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bali al-sāʿatu mawʿiduhum wal-sāʿatu adhā wa-amarru
